verse: You have the right to work, but never to the fruit of work.
meaning: Focus on your actions, not on the results.

verse: The soul is neither born, nor does it die.
meaning: The soul is eternal and indestructible.

verse: Change is the law of the universe. You can be a millionaire, or a pauper in an instant.
meaning: Everything in life is temporary; embrace change.

verse: A person can rise through the efforts of his own mind; or draw himself down, in the same manner.
meaning: You are your own best friend or your own worst enemy.

verse: When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.
meaning: True meditation brings stillness and inner peace.

verse: He who has no attachments can really love others, for his love is pure and divine.
meaning: Selfless love comes from detachment and understanding.

verse: Perform your duty and abandon all attachment to success or failure.
meaning: Balance in success and failure is the mark of true wisdom.

verse: The mind is restless and difficult to restrain, but it is subdued by practice.
meaning: With consistent discipline, even the restless mind can be tamed.

verse: Whatever action is performed by a great man, common men follow in his footsteps.
meaning: Your actions inspire others; act with integrity.

verse: For one who has conquered his mind, the mind is the best of friends; but for one who has failed to do so, his mind will remain the greatest enemy.
meaning: Master your mind, and you master your life.

verse: The self-controlled soul, who moves amongst sense objects, free from attachment and aversion, attains peace.
meaning: Peace arises from self-control and detachment.

verse: Delusion arises from anger. The mind is bewildered by delusion.
meaning: Anger clouds judgment and leads to self-destruction.

verse: As a person puts on new garments, giving up old ones, the soul similarly accepts new material bodies.
meaning: Death is not the end; it’s a change of form.

verse: The wise see knowledge and action as one and the same.
meaning: Wisdom lies in seeing the unity between knowing and doing.

verse: When a person responds to the joys and sorrows of others as if they were his own, he has attained the highest spiritual union.
meaning: Empathy is the true mark of enlightenment.

verse: Those who are motivated only by desire for the fruits of action are miserable, for they are constantly anxious about the results.
meaning: Attachment to results brings anxiety; freedom comes from detachment.

verse: Just as fire is covered by smoke, mirror by dust, and embryo by the womb, knowledge is covered by desire.
meaning: Desire clouds wisdom; self-control reveals truth.

verse: The senses are superior to the body, but superior to the senses is the mind; superior to the mind is the intellect, and superior to the intellect is the self.
meaning: True mastery begins from within, not from the external world.

verse: A person is said to be elevated when they renounce all desires and act without selfish motives.
meaning: Spiritual progress means transcending desire.

verse: One who sees inaction in action, and action in inaction, is intelligent among men.
meaning: Wisdom is seeing beyond the surface of actions.

verse: The wise work without attachment, surrendering the fruits of their work to God.
meaning: Selfless work leads to liberation.

verse: Faith is born of the self; a person is what his faith is.
meaning: Your faith shapes your reality.

verse: When your mind has overcome the confusion of duality, you will attain the state of pure consciousness.
meaning: Transcend opposites like joy and sorrow to find peace.

verse: The one who sees inaction in action and action in inaction is truly wise.
meaning: Spiritual intelligence is seeing the divine in every act.

verse: No one who does good work will ever come to a bad end, either here or in the world to come.
meaning: Good actions always bear positive fruit, even if unseen.

verse: To those who are constantly devoted and who worship Me with love, I give the understanding by which they can come to Me.
meaning: Devotion and love lead to divine wisdom.

verse: Among thousands of men, one may strive for perfection; and among those who strive, only a few truly know Me.
meaning: True realization is rare and precious.

verse: I am the taste in water, the light in the moon and the sun, the sound in air, and the life of all beings.
meaning: The divine presence pervades all of creation.

verse: To the pure-hearted, everything is pure; to the impure, everything is impure.
meaning: Perception depends on the purity of one’s heart.

verse: The peace of God is with them whose mind and soul are in harmony, who are free from desire and wrath.
meaning: Inner harmony brings divine peace.
